forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a bright expanse of blue, punctuated only by the gentle sweep of wisps of cloud. As sunlight bathes the cityscape, temperatures hover around a comfortable 63 degrees, promising a sun-drenched afternoon as the warmth settles. However, a hint of the city’s marine influence lingers, a whisper from the Bay carried by a southwest breeze that dances lightly through the streets. The winds, playful yet persistent, remind us of the ocean's breath with gusts peaking at 23 mph, bringing a refreshing edge to the warmth.

As evening approaches, a shift into a more muted palette awaits—clouds will amass overhead, ushering in a softer, more contemplative atmosphere. Under the waning light, temperatures will gently ease into the 50s, inviting lighter layers to ward off the chill. This interplay of sun and cloud creates a canvas both vibrant and serene, offering urban dwellers an enticing invitation to explore outdoor cafés or stroll along the waterfront, perhaps indulging in a quiet moment of reflection as the lights of the city twinkle against the darkening sky. Whether you choose to wander through the bustling streets or relax with a warm drink in hand, the day promises a blend of comfort and charm that is quintessentially San Francisco.
